languages.text: "На дорожку? На которую из, Лорд-капитан? Они так вьются-вьются, в узелки связываются, да опять расходятся... Мы — нет, я! Я не могу за вас эту дорожку выбрать, ни в коем случае! Вы, главное, ступайте смело и дорога сама изовьется как вы того пожелаете".

"For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."
languages.original_text: "На дорожку? На которую из, Лорд-капитан? Они так вьются-вьются, в узелки связываются, да опять расходятся... Мы — нет, я! Я не могу за вас эту дорожку выбрать, ни в коем случае! Вы, главное, ступайте смело и дорога сама изовьется как вы того пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will lie the way you want it to."

"For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will lie the way you want it to."

"For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

"For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

"For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

languages.text: “这场旅程？哪场旅程，舰长大人？那些道路，它们扭曲、盘绕、纠缠在一起，又分开……我们……我是说，我！我无法为你选择道路，这种事情你不必多问！只要往前走就好，你想往哪个方向走，道路就会朝哪个方向拐。”
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

traits.locale_text: “这场旅程？哪场旅程，舰长大人？那些道路，它们扭曲、盘绕、纠缠在一起，又分开……我们……我是说，我！我无法为你选择道路，这种事情你不必多问！只要往前走就好，你想往哪个方向走，道路就会朝哪个方向拐。”

languages.text: "Zum Abschied? Aber wohin soll es denn gehen, Lord Captain? Es gibt viele Wege, sie kreuzen sich, winden sich, vereinen sich, trennen sich wieder ... Wir ... Ich meine, ich! Ich kann den Weg nicht für Euch wählen, verlangt das nicht von mir! Geht einfach immer geradeaus, und der Weg krümmt sich so, wie Ihr es wollt."
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

traits.locale_text: "Zum Abschied? Aber wohin soll es denn gehen, Lord Captain? Es gibt viele Wege, sie kreuzen sich, winden sich, vereinen sich, trennen sich wieder ... Wir ... Ich meine, ich! Ich kann den Weg nicht für Euch wählen, verlangt das nicht von mir! Geht einfach immer geradeaus, und der Weg krümmt sich so, wie Ihr es wollt."

languages.text: « Pour la route ? Mais quelle route, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Les routes, elles tournent, elles font des zigzags, elles se croisent et se décroisent... On... Enfin, je ! Je ne peux pas choisir votre route, alors ce n'est même pas la peine de demander ! Vous n'avez qu'à continuer d'avancer et vous verrez bien où ça vous mène. »
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

traits.locale_text: « Pour la route ? Mais quelle route, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Les routes, elles tournent, elles font des zigzags, elles se croisent et se décroisent... On... Enfin, je ! Je ne peux pas choisir votre route, alors ce n'est même pas la peine de demander ! Vous n'avez qu'à continuer d'avancer et vous verrez bien où ça vous mène. »

languages.text: «¿Para el camino? ¿Para cuál, Lord Capitán? Los caminos se retuercen, se enroscan y se enmarañan para luego volver a separarse... No podemos... ¡puedo! ¡No puedo elegir el camino por usted, ni se le ocurra pedírmelo! Avance y el camino le llevará adonde quiera ir».
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

traits.locale_text: «¿Para el camino? ¿Para cuál, Lord Capitán? Los caminos se retuercen, se enroscan y se enmarañan para luego volver a separarse... No podemos... ¡puedo! ¡No puedo elegir el camino por usted, ni se le ocurra pedírmelo! Avance y el camino le llevará adonde quiera ir».

languages.text: 「道ですって？ロード・キャプテン、どっちへ行けばいいの？道はねじれ、とぐろを巻き、互いに絡み合って、そしてまた分かれている…あたいたちは…つまりあたい…あたいは、あなたのための道を選ぶなんてできないわ。だから聞かないで！ただ真っすぐ進んでいけば、望む方向に道が曲がっていくはずよ
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."

traits.locale_text: 「道ですって？ロード・キャプテン、どっちへ行けばいいの？道はねじれ、とぐろを巻き、互いに絡み合って、そしてまた分かれている…あたいたちは…つまりあたい…あたいは、あなたのための道を選ぶなんてできないわ。だから聞かないで！ただ真っすぐ進んでいけば、望む方向に道が曲がっていくはずよ

languages.text: "Yola çıkmadan önce mi? Hangisine Lord Kaptan? Yollar kıvrılır, ayrışır, yeniden bir araya gelir, yeniden ayrılır. Biz... Daha doğrusu ben!.. Ben önündeki yolu senin için seçemem, bunu benden isteme lütfen! Sadece yürümeye devam et. Yol, sen hangi yöne istersen o yöne kıvrılacaktır."
languages.original_text: "For the road? Which one, Lord Captain? The roads, they twist, and coil, and tangle together, and separate again... We... I mean, I! I can't choose the road for you, please don't even ask! Just walk right on ahead, and the road will wind whichever way you want it to."
